title: Manage Closed Captions for VOD Content
description: A user reports that the closed captions for a specific movie are out of sync with the audio.

tasks.description: Identify the movie and retrieve its associated closed caption file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the specific movie asset and its caption file (e.g., an SRT file).

tasks.description: Analyze the caption file's timestamps against the video file's timecode.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms a consistent 2-second delay in the caption timestamps.

tasks.description: Apply a global timestamp offset to the caption file to correct the sync issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adjusts all timestamps in the caption file.

tasks.description: Replace the faulty caption file on the streaming server with the corrected version.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the file on the server.
